attributes.action: GET RID OF JACKIE SMITH WHO HAS EXPECTED THE TAX PAYER TO TO PAY FOR PORNO MOVIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS WOMAN SHOULD NOW RESIGN IN DISCRACE BUYING PORNO MOVIES AND EXPECTING THE  TAX PAYERS TO PICK UP THE BILL

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
